name: Rune of Power: Episode III
description:
In Episode I and II the brave hero collected the runes needed to defeat the evil sorcerer.

Now, with his powers to move the earth itself and no other ambitions, this mighty wizard decided to sit back, relax and enjoy collecting eggs.

Click on the ground 3 times to move the tiles

First click - choose a tile to move

Second click - choose direction and distance

Third click - confirm
